com.tractrac.clientmodule

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.Attachments
      • com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.IdBase
        • com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.IdBaseNamed
          • com.tractrac.clientmodule.Race
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMetadataContainer

    public class Race
extends IdBaseNamed
implements IMetadataContainer
    Encapsulates data related to a specific Race of a TracTrac Event.

    An instance of this class has a unique id and a name. Furthermore it has a number of so-called Race Competitors, one for each Competitor of the event, that is used to wrap Competitor data that may be different from Race to Race.

    Custom data may be attached to each Race instance.

    Use Event.addRace(java.util.UUID, java.lang.String) to create a new Race.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    TracTrac
    See Also:
    Event, Competitor, RaceCompetitor
